short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display the 42 Intra Black Hole in a less stressing way, making it a more wholesome experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feeling pressured by the Black Hole and the counter that comes with it? With this extension, you are able to hide the demotivating countdown and sad emote, replacing it by a date and a motivating message.
